text: The Journal of Business Venturing is a bimonthly peer-reviewed multidisciplinary academic journal publishing research on all aspects of entrepreneurship. Its scope spans the disciplines of economics, psychology, and sociology. It was established in 1985 by Ian MacMillan and is published by Elsevier. The editor-in-chief is Jeff McMullen (Indiana University). According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2017 impact factor of 6.000. It is one of the 50 journals that the Financial Times uses to compile its business school rankings.Financial Times Ranking Since 2014, the journal awards the "Journal of Business Venturing Best Paper Award".JBV Best Paper Award ==References== ==External links== * Category:Publications established in 1985 Category:Entrepreneurship Category:Business and management journals Category:Multidisciplinary social science journals Category:Elsevier academic journals Category:Bimonthly journals Category:English-language journals
title: Journal of Business Venturing
